mapper.insert: insert into TB_LINK_QUALITY( TASKID, SRC, DES, JITTER, DELAY, LOSSRATE, INTIME, LINK_QUALITY_ID ) values ( #{TASKID}, #{SRC}, #{DES}, #{JITTER}, #{DELAY}, #{LOSSRATE}, #{INTIME}, #{LINK_QUALITY_ID} )
mapper.update: update TB_LINK_QUALITY set TASKID = #{TASKID}, SRC = #{SRC}, DES = #{DES}, JITTER = #{JITTER}, DELAY = #{DELAY}, LOSSRATE = #{LOSSRATE}, INTIME = #{INTIME}, LINK_QUALITY_ID = LINK_QUALITY_ID where LINK_QUALITY_ID = #{LINK_QUALITY_ID}
mapper.select: select TASKID, SRC, DES, JITTER, DELAY, LOSSRATE, INTIME, LINK_QUALITY_ID from TB_LINK_QUALITY where LINK_QUALITY_ID = #{LINK_QUALITY_ID}
select a.TASKID, a.SRC, a.DES, a.JITTER, a.DELAY, a.LOSSRATE, a.INTIME, a.LINK_QUALITY_ID from TB_LINK_QUALITY a
select a.TASKID, a.SRC, a.DES, a.JITTER, a.DELAY, a.LOSSRATE, a.INTIME, a.LINK_QUALITY_ID from TB_LINK_QUALITY a
mapper.delete:
delete from TB_LINK_QUALITY where LINK_QUALITY_ID in
